full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I TSOGS MCHOD BYA TSUL DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU'I TSOGS MCHOD BYA TSUL DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BA BA 'DI NI, RNAM 'DREN RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO'I GSOL DPON DPYOD LDAN RJE DRUNG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
